title: Beanie Mania
description:
Today on True Story, Tig and Cheryl spill ALL the beanies as they discuss "Beanie Mania," the HBO doc chronicling the Beanie Baby craze of the late '90s. Are Tig and Cheryl "Beanie Ladies?" What do they make of the "Beanie Rap"? All that and more on a very Ty Inc. True Story!

*this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

  • Follow the show:
  • Instagram: @tigandcheryltruestory
  • Twitter: @TandCTrueStory
